# paymentData

**Instance Property**

The payment data as a UTF-8 encoded serialization of a JSON dictionary.

## Declaration

```swift
var paymentData: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

Send this data to your e-commerce back-end system, where it can be decrypted and submitted to your payment processor.

For the format of the payment data, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/PassKit/Reference/PaymentTokenJSON/PaymentTokenJSON.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40014929].

## Related Documentation

- **Wallet Developer Guide**

## Working with payment tokens

- **paymentMethod**: Information about the card used in the transaction.
- **PKPaymentMethod**: An object that contains information about payment methods.
- **transactionIdentifier**: A unique identifier for this payment.
